    • 构造器详细资料

      • Log4jThreadFactory

        public Log4jThreadFactory(String threadFactoryName,
                          boolean daemon,
                          int priority)
        Constructs an initialized thread factory.
        参数:
        threadFactoryName - The thread factory name.
        daemon - Whether to create daemon threads.
        priority - The thread priority.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createDaemonThreadFactory

        public static Log4jThreadFactory createDaemonThreadFactory(String threadFactoryName)
        Creates a new daemon thread factory.
        参数:
        threadFactoryName - The thread factory name.
        返回:
        a new daemon thread factory.

      • createThreadFactory

        public static Log4jThreadFactory createThreadFactory(String threadFactoryName)
        Creates a new thread factory. This is mainly used for tests. Production code should be very careful with creating non-daemon threads since those will block application shutdown (see https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/LOG4J2-1748).
        参数:
        threadFactoryName - The thread factory name.
        返回:
        a new daemon thread factory.

      • newThread

        public Thread newThread(Runnable runnable)
        指定者:
        newThread 在接口中 ThreadFactory
